keyLearnings: TDD (Test-Driven Development) prevents technical debt - tests during development, not after
Agile process is not overhead - even solo dev with AI needs structure to prevent chaos
Accessibility is not optional - 51% score would be rejected by App Store
AI can code, but humans decide priorities and acceptable risk
Definition of Done prevents 'done but untested' situations
Sprint reviews catch issues early before they become problems
